text: Va ʙa tavri çiddī ʙa Alloh qasam xūrdand, ki Alloh murdaro rūzi qijomat az nav zinda namekunad, ammo Alloh in qasamhoi onhoro durūƣ ʙarovarda megūjad: Ore, in va'daest (ja'ne duʙora zinda kardani Alloh murdagonro), ki ʙeşuʙha, ançom dodani on ʙar ūhdai Ūst, vale ʙeştari mardum az saʙaʙi çahlaşon namedonand va muxolifati pajomʙaron karda ducori kufr meşavand
